dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Someone's missing. Kandomere charges upstairs with Montehugh in tow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kandomere studies the walls...

dialogues.speaker: MONTEHUGH
dialogues.text: We searched up here.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: I hear a candle burning. He pulls down a bookcase revealing a hidden door. He draw pistol open it. Revealing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A single candle burns on an altar. Various magic relics a scrolls. On the floor is a dead human -- His upper body h been turned to solid gold! Montehugh blinks...

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: They're training a bright. BEHIND THEM -- Is Brown. Gold fever in his greedy eyes...

dialogues.speaker: MONTEHUGH
dialogues.text: Get the fuck outta here. That’s evidence.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Evidence? Looks like a house in Big Bear and a new Tesla to me. Kandomere and Montehugh give him withering looks. Brown j smiles and backs away... WE FOLLOW BROWN -- As he pulls his cell and dials...  58.

dialogues.speaker: BROWN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (into phone) Get down here right now. I found something interesting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby sets water bottles on the counter. Looking just be to shit. Smiles at the CLERK, a hardass Korean man behind Plexiglas. Jakoby grabs a handful of candybars.

dialogues.speaker: CLERK
dialogues.text: Are you a real cop?

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Yeah. I’m a real cop.

dialogues.speaker: CLERK
dialogues.text: But you’re green.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: I’m blue. Cops are blue. Jakoby pays the man. INT. SHERRI’S MOM’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - NIGHT Ward's daughter Sophia lays under a blanket with a flashlight. Drawing a picture with crayons. Her grandmoth pulls the blanket aside. SHERRI’S MOTHER You're supposed to be sleeping young lady.

dialogues.speaker: SOPHIA
dialogues.text: I’m making daddy a card. She shows grandma a crude drawing of Ward, Jakoby and her under a smiling sun. It reads: “SORRY I WAS MEAN DADDY I LOVE YOU SO MUCH EVERYTHING WILL BE OK!”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby gives Ward a water. Tikka curled up, asleep.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: How the fuck is she sleeping?  59.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Adrenaline dump. She shut right down. Sophia does it too. Jakoby sits. He and Ward tap waters -- “Cheers” Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Your arm okay?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: My arm’s fucked.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Can you move it?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I can move it.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Bro. Running into a Fogteeth party? Man, I don’t know about that. That was a bad move.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I didn't deploy pepper spray.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: I’m just saying, Orcs hold grudges. (then) That crazy homeless fucker we hooked this afternoon? Remember what all he was saying? Like you think there’s a chance we're ... in a prophecy right now?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: It was just a coincidence. Shit happens. Shit is happening. (a beat, sadly) You know there’s no way we’re still cops after this.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: -.-are you sure..? He’s sure. Jakoby visibly sags. He needs hope.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Why choose me as your partner? I mean, no one wanted to work with me. But you did.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I dunno man. You seemed cool.  60.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: I couldn't believe it ‘cause to me you were like, you know. You're the guy on the poster. You’re fearless. You always know what to do.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Except for the dating thing.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: That’s how you get blooded as an Orc. You do an act of great bravery. And what you did back there ... I mean the way I see it, you’re a blooded human now. You’re who I want be.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Nick. You’re a good cop and a good guy. It’s just that everyone's really hard on you. So you are too. Jakoby can see that. Then...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Why’d you to lie to me, man? I’m not saying shit would’a gone down different, but it might have.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Dunno. I just lied. And then with humans, everything’s so fucking definite. You know? You say one thing and then it’s like law and you can’t walk it back. I got confused.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Okay. We make it through the night: just clue me in next time, dumbass.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Sorry, man. You’re right. A siren WHOOPS -- A BLACK AND WHITE PULLS UP -- Jakoby an Ward grab their weapons. On high alert. Tikka stirs...

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: Drop your fucking guns! Right now!  61. It's Rodriguez in his Sheriff's car -- He pops out with h pistol aimed at them -- Ward protectively guards Tikka. Jakoby lays his shotgun on the ground. Then Ward his pist

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Not you too, man.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: “Not me too” what? There’s a shit- load of radio traffic about you guys. Shooting cops? Evading?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: It’s complicated.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: I’m taking you into custody.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: We got a wand with us. It was ata call with this kid. Everything went sideways. The guys on our watch lost their shit and were gonna do us over the wand.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: Show me the wand. Jakoby looks at Ward -- Who shakes his head: No. Jakoby takes the wand from his belt, shows Rodriquez anyway... RODRIGUEZ (CONT’D) Aw shit. Just put it down. Please. We gotta evacuate this neighborhood. Look. I’m calling my supervisor. I’11 blow you outta your socks if you make a move.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Rodriguez. Don’t call it in man. There's major forces at play here. We don’t know who’s dirty and who’s not. This is a fucking magic wand, dude.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: Shut up. Ward turns to Jakoby and smiles -- A callback to earlier.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: See how it feels? (as Jakoby) Shut up shut up shut up.  62.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Shut up.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: I‘’1l call the Magic Taskforce, We'll get the feds here, the big guns. I’1l keep you guys safe. But priority one is to keep the wand out of the wrong hands. Right now I don’t trust anybody but the feds. Rodriguez is one of the good guys. No doubt. Ward sighs, nearly collapsing onto Jakoby, who lets out a sob-like no of relief. Rodriguez dialing his cell...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibson watches Slasher swing an axe at a bundle of cables a steel pole -- THWACK! -- There's a shower of sparks... TILT UP TO REVEAL -- He’s just disabled a CELLPHONE TOWER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rodriguez looks at his phone. He lost signal. The significance isn’t lost on him...

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: Ward, I need you to cuff Jakoby. For my safety and your safety. Then I’m going to cuff you. Ward not a fan of that...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Just do it, Scott. It is what is. I’m tired of running. Ward cuffs Jakoby. It’s hateful. Rodriguez approaches War Cuffs him. Searches him, tossing away his knives and back gun. Searches Jakoby, tossing away his weapons, his keys.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: It doesn’t look good. A green cop and three dead humans?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: The fuck is that supposed to mean?  63.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: I’m not being a dick. I’m being real as fuck. They’re gonna want it to be Jakoby. Even if it’s not.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: I can’t go to prison. Big Orc Family runs that shit. They’1l fucking skin me alive.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: You're not going to prison. I did it. I shot everyone.

dialogues.speaker: RODRIGUEZ
dialogues.text: Both you guys need to shut up and lawyer up. I’m gonna Mirandize you. Then you’re getting counsel. Promise me. Whatever went down, the truth always comes out. No matter how painful-- --THWACK! Rodriguez's chest explodes! He pitches forward and hits the ground... REVEALING GIBSON BEHIND HIM! -- Stalking forward with an automatic weapon...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: No no no! He tries to protect Tikka -- But Tikka isn’t having it -- runs out, grabs Jakoby’s keys and throws them to Ward. Sm girl. Jakoby snatches up the wand. The three of them bolt for the front of the Gas Station... BRDDDDDDDT! -- Gibson chases them with a burst -- Hitting Rodriguez's car -- Spraying them with glass and plastic..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby and Ward hug the floor, uncuffing each other with keys Tikka recovered...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Who the fuck is that? Now the Apocalypse starts -- BRDDDDDDDDDDDDDDT! Bullets shatter windows and rip apart shelves, filling th air with Slim Jims and Flamin Hot Fritos. Wall coolers explode with rainbow bursts of colored soda. A pause in t gunfire -- The Clerk pops up with a magnum and a scowl...  64.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Sir! Stay down! THWAP! -- The Clerk is cored out with a slug, blood paint the inside of his Plexiglas security window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slasher jacks a fresh round into his sniper rifle. His weapon lays across the hood of a random parked car.

dialogues.speaker: SLASHER
dialogues.text: (into radio) Target down. You’re clear. ON GIBSON -- She shoulders her weapon and scans the shatt windows for movement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s quiet. Just the sound of leaking soda. Ward nods at the back door. Jakoby shakily nods back. To Tikka...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Sweetheart I need you to run. As fast as you can. We have to cross the street. Run and don’t look back. Okay Tikka? Tikka looks up and nods once. Ward turns to Jakoby:

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: On three. One-- --Jakoby is already up and moving. Shit. Ward and Tikka follow, staying low... BRDDDDDDT! -- Gunfire rakes the walls. Jakoby is first through the back door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ward, Jakoby and Tikka exit -- BRDDDDDT! -- Cowboy is rig there and opens fire! Tikka balks, Ward scoops her up wit his good arm... It's Jakoby’s turn to shine -- He scoops up the shotgun, turns and fires -- KABOOM! -- The blast flooring Cowboy! Now Slasher appears from the side -- BRDDDT! His burst crashes into Jakoby’s shotgun, smashing the receiver.  65. In a fit of rage Jakoby hurls the shotgun Slasher with al his considerable might... Slasher just blocks it from smashing his skull, but is se tumbling ass over tea kettle. Ward, Jakoby and Tikka make across the street. Vanishing between a row of shops... Gibson arrives to find Slasher staggering to his feet. An Cowboy laying in an expanding pool of blood, already slap on a bandage. He’s one tough motherfucker...

dialogues.speaker: COWBOY
dialogues.text: I'm fine. I got it. Gibson doesn’t wait for them. She stalks her prey across street...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ward, Jakoby and Tikka running. Suddenly wand in Jakoby’s belt begins GLOWING -- He's YANKED BACKWARDS -- Lands har on his back, the wand falling free: Once again they went too far and too fast and triggered t spell binding the wand to its owner -- Whoever or whateve that may be... Jarred loose, the wand lays in the street, next to Jakoby Ward rushes back to help his partner. Finds Jakoby is stunned. His uniform smoking from the wand.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Nick, you okay? Shit, you gotta get up, dude. A black Escalade screams into the underpass. Onto the sidewalk next to them -- Ward sits up Jakoby...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're moving. Now. Jakoby staggers to his feet. SCREECH! -- A second Escalad screams up, boxing them in. Ward reaches for his gun. Remembers it’s not there.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: This night’s gettin’ better and better. Ten FOGTEETH ORCS pop out in unison. Big, bad, scary and pissed off. We may recognize them from the party. Ward knows they're fucked. But he can’t help smiling...  66.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Hey guys. Look. I’m going to give you a pass for the reckless driving. I need you to return to your vehicles. And drive away. Safely. Jakoby drops his head in his hands -- Oh God did he just that? Even the Fogteeth Orcs pause. DORGHU, the pack leader, cocks his massive gnarled head...

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: You think it’s funny to trash our home and disrespect our celebration? Pinkskin?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Guys. Seriously. I’m not in the mood. This is your last chance to walk away or you’re all going to jail. The Orcs trade looks -- ‘The balls on this guy!’ They clo in so Ward throws the first punch! He’s hurled to the gro and the beating begins. They just pummel Ward and Jakoby. Tikka screams in fear! NEW ANGLE -- Gibson is just visible down the block. Frown at this new development...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The windows are boarded, the furniture torn. Orc black velvet paintings and Orc kitsch decorate the place. The r is packed with FOGTEETH ORCS of various shapes and sizes, repping their gang with black and orange. Kneeling among them on the floor are Jakoby and Ward. Tik between them, crying silently. Dorghu kneels in front of Jakoby. He smiles. Fatherly.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: You know I’m not from here. I grew up in Miami. Great orc communities there, strong orc communities. We'd have block parties with dwarves, humans, it was fun. I wasn’t in the game then. I was a bus driver. Then I move to LA. City of Angels, right? I see these kids, I see how broken the system you got here is. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Orcs caught between the police and the gangsters. I see I need to change. And I do. I organize things. We have our own thing now. I know what I am. And I still give back to the community. Not just Ores. Every month I throw a big house-party, get people drunk. Feed them. Whole neighborhood's invited, black, brown, yellow, green. Partying together. With one rule - No guns, no fights inside. It’s sanctuary. Three years of peace. And who breaks sanctuary? Who’s first to bring in guns? The motherfucking police. He sighs, runs a curious finger across Jakoby’s filed tee Time to teach the youngsters...

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: An unblooded orc. And a cop. Grew up with humans. Never had a claw raised for him in his life. Playing the “nice guy” the “sweet guy.” Your buddies so happy to say they have an “orc friend.” Here's your opportunity to give back. He switches to orkish, suddenly animalistic, he snarls:

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Where is the wand? Jakoby is silent, breathing hard. Dorghu nods to a couple BIG ORCS -- They begin WHIPPING JAKOBY AND WARD WITH STEE CHAINS! The Two men scream in agony.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Fuck! You! Tikka SHRIEKS in a panic, her whole body shaking convulsively. Dorghu suddenly grabs her by the face.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Where is the wand? Eyes wide with fear, Tikka speaks in shaky English...

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: There is no wand.  68. Dorghu stares at Tikka, then nods to Jakoby, who is pulle to his knees. He grabs Jakoby’s face.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Roundtooth. False orc. Unblooded coward. The other Orcs murmur in agreement, Jakoby stares at Dorg

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where is the wand? Jakoby sneers -- WHAM! -- Dorghu PUNCHES HIM IN THE FACE, grabs his ear..

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where is the wand, boy?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: There’s no wand, dude.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Was I talking to you pinkface!?

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: There is no wand. Dorghu pulls an Orkish ceremonial dagger. Ornate. Ancient

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Where is the wand?

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: What wand? Dorghu grins. Predatory. Stabs down into the top of Jakoby's shoulder. Jakoby ROARS in pain. Dorghu drives hi to the floor with a knee in the chest. And twists the kni

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: You motherfucker! Stop it! Leave him alone you piece of shit. A Big Orc loops a chain around Ward’s neck. Hauls back making his eyes bulge. Ward claws the air. Dorghu will ki Jakoby if he doesn’t stop. Each word a knife twist...

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Where. Is. The. Wand?

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: (agony ) There’s no wand! Arggh!  69.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Altamira thinks there’s a wand. The Orc choking Ward loosens his grip. Ward coughs this o

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: First, you seriously need to pop a gum. Second, there never was a fuckin wand. Altamira’s a bunch of crackheads. It’s ghetto rumors, dude. Just ghetto rumors.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: The police think there’s a wand. The feds think there’s a wand. (roars) I think there’s a wand! WHACK! -- A Fogteeth Orc PUNCHES WARD in the jaw, knockin him to the floor. Dorghu rips his dagger from Jakoby. And grabs Tikka by her hair. Ward gets deliberate and quiet..

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Please leave her alone. She’s just a little girl. She’s going home. Let her go home. He’s WHIPPED WITH A CHAIN, screams in pain.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: We're police officers! You can't do this! An orc kicks Jakoby down, stomps his face into the floor. Again and again. Breaking his nose... Now both of the cops lay defeated, broken, rasping in pai Dorghu presses his dagger to Tikka’s throat...

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: I'll cover you with her hot blood. Where is the wand? The cops just moan in pain. Dorghu wrenches Tikka’s tiny, fragile arm. She cries out in pain... Ward looks at her. She looks at him -- Telling him to STA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STRONG with her eyes -- A flicker of respect and awe roll across Ward's face -- This little girl is someone special

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I don't know! I don't know where the wand is, I don't fucking know!  70. Dorghu senses he’s been bested but doesn’t understand how It’s over -- He nods to his subordinates. Ward, Jakoby an Tikka are dragged down the hallway into...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE FLOOR HAS BEEN RIPPED OUT -- Above an incredibly deep pit, dug deep beneath the house, vanishing into darkness. Ward and Jakoby are laid face down so their heads hang ov the edge. The Big Orcs stand over them, a boot on their backs. Ward and Jakoby staring into the abyss. They trade looks and sad little smiles -- Each saying to the other “ with you my brother, I'm with you." Dorghu’s huge paw clasping Tikka’s throat...

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Watch your friends. Ward fights back tears...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Sophia. I’m so sorry. Please forgive me! I didn’t say goodbye. I didn’t say I love you. The Orcs are all business now. Ward and Jakoby are just objects to be disposed of. Both men now stoic. Tikka sobbing. Dorghu tries one last time...

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Where is the wand?

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: There is no fucking wand, stupid. Dorghu stares at them, and then:

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: Kill them. A Big Orc presses a shotgun to the back of Jakoby’s head. ORC GANGSTER steps up with a fucking big bolt action deer rifle. CLACK-CLACKS a round in the chamber. Holds the muzzle to the back of Ward’s head. The Gangster hesitates

dialogues.speaker: ORC GANGSTER
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Wait. All the Orcs look at him.  71. ORC GANGSTER (CONT’D) Turn over. Ward slowly turns over. ORC GANGSTER (CONT’D) You too. Jakoby turns over, his smashed nose bleeds into his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: (subtitled) What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: ORC GANGSTER
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Father, I am sorry, I know these men. All of the Orcs wait expectantly. ORC GANGSTER (CONT’D) (subtitled) I was in the swap meet going to school when an Ore from another Clan lit up a liquor store. (re: Jakoby) He saw me and chased me. I was trapped. And he saw I was the wrong Orc. He helped me escape the police. The human police. Dorghu processing this... ORC GANGSTER (CONT’D) (subtitled) I owe him an honor debt. We cannot kill them.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: (subtitled) They mock us.

dialogues.speaker: ORC GANGSTER
dialogues.text: (subtitled) Maybe there is no wand. Father and son stare at each other. The father nods, releases Tikka. Kneels by Jakoby.

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU
dialogues.text: What did you call me roundtooth? “Stupid?”  72. Dorghu pulls him up by the shirt -- WHAM! Punches his fac now he stomps his ribs, his legs. The Orc Gangster cringe

dialogues.speaker: DORGHU, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (subtitled) False orc! Unblooded coward! He stomps and stomps. Ward’s heart breaking as Nick’s blo spatters his face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Montehugh’s laptop connected to the server rack...

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Any luck?

dialogues.speaker: MONTEHUGH
dialogues.text: Drive’s fried. The wand cooked it. If there’s video of our bright, it’1ll take a forensic lab to recover it. Kandomere frowns.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Pull the drive and bag it. Then Kandomere sees something... KANDOMERE (CONT’D) Shit. We got company.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A couple cars of LAPD SWAT COPS has pulled up. Brown talk to them excitedly. Kandomere and Montehugh rapidly approa the knot of cops. Wearing body armor over civilian clothe

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Evening. Can I help you? Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Easy, sir. I called them. We’re a little short handed. Kandomere turns to the SWAT SERGEANT...  Kandomere carbine. Kandomere 73.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Fine. Gimme a perimeter. Take the corners of the block. And stay out of sight.

dialogues.speaker: SWAT SERGEANT
dialogues.text: You're not in charge here.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: What the fuck did you say to me?

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: I think you heard him. This is LAPD's jurisdiction.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: I’m a federal agent. It’s your jurisdiction but it’s my country. Now all of you get the fuck off my crime scene.

dialogues.speaker: SWAT SERGEANT
dialogues.text: We're not debating this. Elf. grinds his jaw in disbelief. Montehugh gripping is Thumb on the safety. The tension is very real.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: (quietly) Don’t let them out of your sight. When the Strike Team gets here, we're arresting all these assholes. turns and heads for the house. A SWAT COP blocks him. Montehugh scanning the big men with scary faces. KANDOMERE (CONT’D) Step aside.

dialogues.speaker: SWAT COP
dialogues.text: I will put you in handcuffs, compadre.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Get the fuck out of my way. The SWAT COP shoves him. Kandomere stares at him, intense The moment hangs pregnant in time. With eerie calm... KANDOMERE (CONT’D) What’s your plan? You know I’m an elf, right? I can hear your heart speeding up. I can smell the adrenaline in your sweat.  74. Brown is right there. Menacing...

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Can you dodge a bullet?

dialogues.speaker: MONTEHUGH
dialogues.text: Kandomere. We’re going. BRDDDDDDT! -- Brown and the SWAT Cops open fire. Montehug falls dead -- But Kandomere flips backwards. Repeatedly, weaving and spinning as bullets hit all around him. Insan agile. Moving as only an Elf can. He dives in his SUV. Punches the gas and tears out of there. TICK-TICK-POCK! -- Bullets smashing into the back as he g He disappears up the block. The SWAT Cops about to pursue Brown WHISTLES piercingly...

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: Hey! No, no! Stay on mission. We grab the gold and find the wand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The neighborhood illegal trash dump. Ward and Jakoby are shoved out of a truck. Then Tikka is pushed out as well. Both of them are virtually pulped at this point. But Jako is in truly dire shape. Ward crawls to him...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Nick? Nick? Can you hear me?

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: «+. my leg’s broken ... my ribs ... I can’t breathe ... I’m done ...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: No you’re not. Hold on. I’11 get you help. Don’t leave me, brother. Jakoby fading -- The beating broke something important inside. Ward grabs his arm, tries to drag him to the stre But Jakoby’s too big and Ward is too weak. Ward collapses screams at the dark houses, clutching Jakoby in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Somebody help us! This is a good man here! Help this man! He's a good man. Help him! Tikka slowly approaches. Ward notices her. She has a stee look in her eye. The with a flick of her wrist -- THE WAN APPEARS FROM NOWHERE RIGHT IN HER HAND! Ward stunned...  75.

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Holy shit. You're a bright. You're a fucking bright. You had the wand the whole time. Tikka speaks quietly, nervously...

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) My job was to learn magic to keep a wand safe. The Dark Lord will return and I am meant to fight him. But I have no wand of my own. A witch came to kill me and the Brothers of Light saved me. The witch left her wand behind.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I don’t understand you. I have no idea what you're saying. I’m sorry.

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) I can’t fix him.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I don’t know what that means. I don’t know what you’re saying.

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: (broken English) If I use this ... Witch find us.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Fuck the witch. If you can help him, then help him. He was ready to die for you. Tikka sees the desperation in Ward’ face. She motions for him to get back. Tikka centers herself. Rubs her hands. Then points the wand at Jakoby and whispers:

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: Mendovia. A beautiful, rippling pulse of “energy” drifts off the wa and passes over Jakoby’s limp form -- Instantaneously we CLICKS and SNAPS as Jakoby’s body repairs itself!

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Oh holy shit. Oh wow.  76. Jakoby suddenly sits up, spitting out blood and sucking i air. Ward rushes in to help him, but Jakoby pushes him aw He’s not dying, but not a 100%. We can feel Ward’s relief Tikka passes out cold. Bleeding from her ear. Dangerously drained...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You okay? Tikka? You gonna be okay? Jakoby scoops her up like a ragdoll. Slides the wand back into his belt. Helps Ward up.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: C’mon partner. I got you. We have to keep moving. They start walking -- An odd little family: A big Orc, a broken man, a tiny Elf Girl. Tikka leads the way. A littl warrior, who has been called to fight much too soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CAMERA FOLLOWS gloppy footprints of black, shiny blood. T lead to bare feet which drag, shuffle and twitch ... WE T UP and SEE a veiny woman’s body in a ratty dress. This is THE WITCH. The wand's owner... Tikka’s voice rolls in like a distant echo -- “Mendovia."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Witch's face whips toward us -- Stringy black hair on patchy scalp framing her sunken pink eyes. Her face a wel of darkness as she sniffs the air...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GIBSON’S SUV parked in the shadows. Cowboy in back. He’s breathing slow. But still in the game. Slasher listens to RADIO INTERCEPT equipment, rapt. Gibson drums her fingernails on the steering wheel.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: What’s so interesting?

dialogues.speaker: SLASHER
dialogues.text: Bunch’a LAPD SWAT guys racing balls out to the bright house.  77.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: You sure? I haven’t heard anything on their Tac Channels.

dialogues.speaker: SLASHER
dialogues.text: They’re not on department Icoms. They're running encrypted satphones. This is eight or so SWAT operators working off the books.

dialogues.speaker: COWBOY
dialogues.text: Sounds like they’re bad pennies.

dialogues.speaker: SLASHER
dialogues.text: Indeed. And let’s just say they sound, um, excited.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Might be our wand. lLet’s go. Maybe we can have a gunfight with some real players for once. She takes off fast...

dialogues.speaker: SLASHER
dialogues.text: What’s our limit here, Gibson? Gibson just stares at him. Cowboy smirks as he pulls a grenade out of his pack and cuts off its safety tape...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bright oasis in the darkness. With lots of good deals. Ward and Jakoby settle down behind a row of minivans. Tik stands guard. Jakoby and Ward are hurting, exhausted, raw Jakoby regards the giant blood red full moon rising...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: That kid, man. The Orc kid I let go.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: The one who was gonna shoot me in the head and throw me in a pit? Great kid.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Listen to me. Listen. He was there. What are the odds of that? What are the fucking odds?  78.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Sure, it was a little unexpected.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: No. It was impossible, Scott. Jakoby fishes a smashed candy bar from his pocket. Shares half with Ward.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This is a prophecy. We’re living prophecy right now. We’re just little people man, people they don't write about. But tonight’s like the old days of the Heroes. Like Jirak doing epic shit.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Just stay awake, keep talking. A cop car with LIGHTS AND SIRENS blows blindly past the l

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Jirak was unblooded. Like me. He was just a farmer. But when he found out the Dark Lord was going to destroy the World. He raised a sword against him and led an army.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Homeboy earned his baller status. Tikka cocks her head SEES SHADOWS among the vehicles...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Before the deed is the word. A farmer was called by prophesy and united the Nine Races against the Dark Lord. He turned the Orcs from evil and they all raised their blades to him. He was blooded right there. Fulfilling the Great Prophecy. (beat) That's what we’re in, a prophecy. This all means something. It’s important. Ward is losing faith in the world. He looks at Jakoby.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: It’s not prophecy, bro. It’s just one bad fuckin’ night and it’s almost over.  79. Tikka spins on them, scared, eyes like saucers...

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) She's coming. She’s coming. Ward hauls Jakoby to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Lunchbreak’s over. We're moving. A WHISTLE behind them. They freeze. Turn. It’s Poison!

dialogues.speaker: POISON
dialogues.text: Hey. Ward and Jakoby look around -- Altamira Veteranos have ta up positions all around the car lot. They’re surrounded a unarmed. It’s over.

dialogues.speaker: POISON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My pops bought lottery tickets every week. Wanted to get us out of the hood. To put us through college. His number never hit. Dude dropped dead mowing someone else’s fucking lawn. So I learned you only bet on sure things. The wand’s a sure thing. A long, empty beat. You can feel the sweat in the air.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: My old man was a fucking underwater welder and drowned. You don’t see me shitting on the world and blaming The Man so I can get mine.

dialogues.speaker: POISON
dialogues.text: Fuck you. Here’s what’s up. Elf girl gets a pass to grow up and do whatever she’s gonna do with her life. But you two putos are dead. And I get the wand. Because dreams do come true. My dreams. Jakoby stares at Ward, Ward stares at Jakoby. Tikka steps forward and holds out the wand...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Tikka! No! Poison and his homies stare at the wand. Victory.  80.

dialogues.speaker: POISON
dialogues.text: Is... Is that it? THE LIGHTS FLICKER. Several go out. Tikka REACTS.

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: »--NO...no...NO... The wand starts glowing, shedding heat ripples -- We’ve s this before...

dialogues.speaker: POISON
dialogues.text: Hey little homegirl. Why’s that shit glowing?

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: (subtitled) She's here. Jakoby looks at Ward -- Shit!

dialogues.speaker: POISON
dialogues.text: Fuck this. We’re killing everyone right now. .--Silence... Poison looks over to his men. SEES a splatt of blood here. A torn piece of flesh there. They're all gone...

dialogues.speaker: POISON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What the f-- --THWICK! -- A pallid veiny hand RIPS HIS THROAT OUT! Poi falls facedown on the asphalt -- And there she is!

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: What is that? What is that?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: .-.-it's a witch... Yes it is. The owner of the wand has returned for her property and she is TERRIFYING -- Greasy black hair falls around a sickly white face, tremendously old and misshape forced onto a young, lithe body. She bears a shotgun woun from her initial fight at the house. A weird, long beat. It’s not even clear if the witch is aware of them. Her body sways gently in the night breeze.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Scott? Are we about to die, bro? Ward exhales shakily.  81.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: If that’s what it takes. You with me? SCHWACK! -- Snaps out his collapsible baton and grins. Hi tired eyes burn with madness...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're arresting this bitch. Jakoby stares at him. Then understands. It’s the only mov They're still cops. And they’1l die with their boots on. SCHWACK! -- Jakoby snaps out his baton. They trade determined nods. Although barely able to stand, they squa off against the Witch...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: LAPD. Turn the fuck around and get on your knees. Put your hands behind your head and interlace your fingers. The Witch HISSES exposing black gums.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: She seems noncompliant.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: I’m getting that too. The Witch HISSES AGAIN. The two brave cops raise their batons to strike... Tikka steps between them and raises the wand...

dialogues.speaker: TIKKA
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: TALIOS
dialogues.text: BLUE FIRE ERUPTS FROM THE WAND TOWARDS THE WITCH! She swa it away like a tennis ball and makes a yanking motion... Pulling her wand towards her, jerking Tikka towards the Witch. Jakoby and Ward grab Tikka...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: The wand! Get the wand! Both men grab for the wand with frantic hands. Jakoby get his hands around it just as Tikka loses her grip and fall the side...  82.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: I got it I got it! Ward gets a hand on it too. Now the two of them go for a ride, as if pulled by a tractor...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: She gets it we're dead! They hold on for life. Their boots sliding over the pavement. An insane game of tug of war. Blood drips down Ward’s gunshot arm. Jakoby’s battered body creaks. He GROANS in pain... Their hands wrapped tightly around the wand -- The wand cutting into their palms, blood leaks out over their knuckles...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Bro, don’t let go. We go and we’re dead! Jakoby ROARS like a lion at the Witch, blood streaming do his face... The Witch laughs as she drags them closer and closer. FUC THEY ARE FUCKED! Ward slides a hand towards his gunbelt. Pivots his tazer in its holster... BAM! -- Fires blind from the hip -- Tazer darts hit the w in the neck. Her body goes RIGID as the tazer pumps high voltage into her... She releases the wand from her spell -- Ward and Jakoby tumble backwards to the ground in a jumble. Jakoby finds himself staring at Poison’s dropped machine gun -- “Yes!” Jakoby grabs the ugly black weapon and comes up firing... BRDDDDDT! -- His shots go wide, shredding cars. CAR ALARM scream out in the night...

dialogues.speaker: KILL HER NICK KILL HER
dialogues.text: Jakoby aiming carefully -- BRDDDDDT! -- Slugs smash into Witch. Splattering black blood in all directions! The Wit drops. Jakoby out of ammo... Now the Witch slowly stands. HOLY SHIT SHE'S STILL ALIVE! She SHRIEKS and summons her wand!

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: The wand, the wand!  83. Ward, on the ground, is brutally dragged across the pavem towards her. Metal on his belt throwing sparks... Jakoby thinks fast. He grabs a heavy steel truck rim from pile of tires. Hurls it with all his heart and might... ON THE WITCH -- Grinning with evil delight -- Here comes prize, her wand. She's winning... K-TANG! -- The rim crushes her head against an old truck a burst of black goo. She drops lifeless... The wand instantly goes slack to Ward’s relief. Jakoby fa against a car. Slumped there in a symphony of car alarms.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Good looking out, partner. They reach out pathetically to bump fists and give up. Wa flops over. His uniform torn, road-rash over half his bod He lifts the wand in his hand, stares at it, then looks o to the dead witch, then to Jakoby...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where's Tikka? Jakoby and Ward look around -- THEY REALIZE TIKKA IS GONE

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Why would she run? Where would she go?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: She's just a kid. Only one place she’d go. Ward pulls himself up against a car, wincing...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: She's going home, Nick. The silence hangs. Jakoby speaks quietly.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: We could leave. The binding spell’s off the wand right? ‘Cause the witch is dead? We can’t run and can’t hide. Consequences or not, we gotta get to a hospital, man. And get out of this fucking neighborhood.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Yeah. But we’re not gonna.  84. Ward spits blood, wipes his drawn, pallid face.

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My dad ran out on me. And Sophia’s dad ran out on her. Everywhere you look it’s people giving up and running away. (beat) Someone’s gotta do it. Someone's gotta be the good guy. A long pause. Then Jakoby nods. He's in. Both men haul themselves to their feet. One last time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It’s quiet. Dead quiet... CAMERA SLOWLY REVEALS -- A dead SWAT COP. Then another. A another. And another. All the SWAT Cops are dead, shot to pieces. All killed in a vicious gunfight. CAMERA FINDS BROWN -- Crawling to his car, dying from gunshots. He SEES two figures approaching. Ward and Jakob emerge from the night mist like zombies...

dialogues.speaker: BROWN
dialogues.text: ...not you assholes... He tries to draw his pistol. Ward easily takes it away. N Jakoby and Ward watch in total silence as Brown dies. THEN A NOISE FROM THE HOUSE -- Ward nods for Jakoby to pi up a SWAT shotgun. He does. Ward and Jakoby approach the house. Limping up the porch stairs, Ward motions for Jako to go around the side... As Jakoby slips along the side, WE SEE something he doesn Slasher, holding a rifle, watching him from the shadows..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ward moves very slowly, clearing the house. Now in the living room -- There's Cowboy dead in a pool of blood...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NOISE from the kitchen. Ward heads toward it... NEW ANGLE -- Gibson standing there breathing softly. Hidd by a bookcase. She’s looking at Cowboy. Who looks back. He's not dead. Despite heavy injuries, he rises to his fe  85. Together they close in on Ward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby moves toward the back yard. Quiet deliberate steps Slasher starting to follow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FROM A LOW ANGLE -- We watch Ward enter the kitchen... REVERSE -- Tikka’s curled up under the sink, hidden by so pots. She waves gently. Trying to get Ward’s attention. H doesn’t see her... ON GIBSON -- Moving almost spectrally as she glides forwa Trying to get an angle on Ward... CLOSE ON WARD -- He can’t see her. But he pauses. Biting his lip. Maybe he feels a change in air pressure or

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: something. Ward suddenly spins around -- Cowboy is right there! POP-POP! -- Ward hits Cowboy in the face. Dropping him. N Ward spots Gibson! But she has the drop on him. Her carbi aimed at his face... But Ward has skills -- He jukes, spins and fires -- POP-P

dialogues.speaker: BAM
dialogues.text: Ward is hit in the chest. Gibson once in the face. Both o them fall. Tikka SCREAMS and bursts from her hiding place with a CLATTER of pots... BAM! -- Gibson shoots Tikka in the back! -- Sending her spinning into the cupboards...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Nooooo! Tikka writhes in pain on the linoleum -- Ward raises his at Gibson. And hesitates... Because Gibson has her carbine trained on Tikka...

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Don’t. Jakoby appears in the big hole in the wall -- Shotgun aim at Gibson...  86.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Wait wait wait! Nick wait! Jakoby SEES the jeopardy that Tikka is in. Sees the state Ward, he’s bad. Real bad. Gibson slowly pushing herself t her feet, keeping her gun on Tikka...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: She just shot a kid Scott.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Yeah. And she’ll do it again. Gibson SEES Slasher sneak past the kitchen window, moving flank Jakoby. Her eyes flick to Ward...

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Drop your weapon. No way Ward will do that. Gibson looks at Tikka, finger o the trigger...

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This trigger has a four pound break. Maybe you’ll destroy my brain stem with a perfect shot. But the girl will still die. Ward glares at her -- She’s being covered by Jakoby -- So tosses his gun away...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Bro. Don’t. Shit.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Get up. Go to the table. Ward, in excruciating pain, plants his feet and drives himself slowly up the wall...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: You're crazy. You’re a fucking animal. Jakoby staring down his sights at Gibson. Hyper focused.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Please. Sit down. Take a moment to think about what you’re doing. Ward staggers to the table, slowly sinks into a chair.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where is the wand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck are you?

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: (after a long beat) I represent a larger interest. One that watches. And waits. For opportunities and capitalizes on them. The wand is an opportunity. (beat) You're going to give me the wand.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: And then what?

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: I’m going to kill you and your orc friend. I’m going to walk out of this house. I’m going to work out and train and wait for my next assignment.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Right. 87. Suddenly they hear a storm of TRUCK ENGINES AND SCREECHIN TIRES out front...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SIX BLACK SUVs swarm the property. Kandomere and Gordon Vance pop out with a dozen hi-tech SPECIAL OPERATORS, everyone armored and tooled up for a firefight... Kandomere regards the house a beat. His eyes go wide.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: There’s a bright in the house.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON VANCE
dialogues.text: You sure? How do you know?

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Have I been wrong yet? Vance turns to his men as they form assault teams.

dialogues.speaker: GORDON VANCE
dialogues.text: It’s confirmed a bright’s in there. Kill everything that moves. An Assault Team heads for the back of the house.  88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ward heard them. Gibson heard them...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: So ... do you have a new plan? Gibson doesn’t waver. Tikka moaning in pain on the floor. Ward slides a hand towards the pocket on his thigh where wand is stashed...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The second she lowers that gun even an inch you kill her Nick.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Roger that, partner. Gibson regards Jakoby. Looks back at Ward. SEES Ward now holds the wand...

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Interesting. Now put it down.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: You're either born a bright or you study for years. Are you a bright? No. Do you know any spells? No. Try to use that wand and it will kill you.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Shut up.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: There’s no way out. Give me the wand while this little creature is still breathing.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Nick. Get Tikka out of here.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: No, Orc. You don’t move. Jakoby, still aiming his gun at Gibson, slowly moves into kitchen, towards Tikka...

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Don't move another fucking inch.  89. Jakoby stops. The shotgun shakes in his hands...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Nick. It’s okay. Get Tikka.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: What are you doing, Scott?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: It’s gonna be okay.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: Listen to your Orc.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Ward smiles at his friend. Quietly...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: It’s like you said. It’s a prophecy. It’s all a prophecy.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: You really believe that?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: No. So I need you to believe it for me. (then) Get Tikka out of here.

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: You'll do no such thing. (to Ward) Imagine sitting in front of a candle day and night for years. Learning the stillness of mind a wand requires. Years of repeating the same spells. Precise articulations of ancient word forms. Tikka, looking at Gibson, realizes something. At the same time Ward does...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: ..-you’re a bright... NEW ANGLE -- Slasher steps through the hole into the kitc Weapon trained on Jakoby. Softly whispers...  90.

dialogues.speaker: SLASHER
dialogues.text: Easy friend. I got the drop on you. Let’s not have any mistakes here. I need you to slowly lower your weapon. Jakoby knows he fucked up...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: What do I do?

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: Don’t you dare lower that shotgun. Gibson takes a step towards Ward...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Stop.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: «--Scott..?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Assault Team creeps up -- THEY SEE Slasher in the kit through the hole in the wall...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gibson's eyes bore in on Ward...

dialogues.speaker: GIBSON
dialogues.text: It’s over. It’s hopeless.

dialogues.speaker: NOW. EVERYTHING. HAPPENS. AT. ONCE...
dialogues.text: POP-POP! -- Slasher is shot in the back by the Assaulters Jakoby fires his shotgun at Gibson -- KABOOM! .+.Just as Slasher falls onto him, knocking his aim askew «+.-so he only blows out a chunk of wall by Gibson’s head Who swings her carbine from Tikka to Ward...

dialogues.speaker: TALIOS
dialogues.text: gl. THE FUCKING ROOM EXPLODES INTO LIGHT. The wand BLOWS APAR

dialogues.speaker: INTO THE WALL...
dialogues.text: A LIQUID INFERNO OF LIGHT splashing in all directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LIGHT AND FIRE EXPLODE OUT THE WINDOWS -- Vance and the o operators dive to the ground. ON KANDOMERE -- He doesn’t flinch. Even as the shockwave blows back his clothes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE KITCHEN LOOKS LIKE LITERAL HELL -- Everything engulfe fire... Jakoby sees Slasher is still alive. Taking aim at him. Jakoby fires -- Buckshot knocks Slasher into the flames.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Scott! Scott where are you!? Nothing. He SEES Tikka unconscious on the floor. Jakoby lifts her, he staggers to the front door...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby stumbles out of the house with Tikka in his arms. Towards a jittery firing squad of Special Operators!

dialogues.speaker: ORC
dialogues.text: BRDDDDT! -- Gordon opens fire, Kandomere with his Elvin reflexes shoves his gun down just in time... Jakoby stumbles and drops to his knees...

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Help the child! Jakoby is surrounded. Tikka is immediately taken away fro him, rushed to the PARAMEDICS. FIRE ENGINES arrive... Jakoby is clearly dazed, barely able to stand, but he man to get up -- He’s headed back towards the house...  92. Across the street -- The intimidating Orcs of the Fogteet Gang have gathered to watch... Kandomere blocks Jakoby’s path... KANDOMERE (CONT’D) Stop. We got you. It’s safe now.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: You don’t understand, there’s a prophecy. This is part of something bigger...

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Calm down. I know it’s something bigger. But you need to calm down. The house is now a complete inferno -- And Jakoby is will to walk right back in. Kandomere won’t allow that... Jakoby looks around, dazed. PEOPLE have finally come out their homes. Now liberated from the predations of the Altamira Gang. Sensing something special has happened...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Please listen, listen to me. He saved me and the girl, you can’t just let him burn. Gordon Vance helps out...

dialogues.speaker: GORDON VANCE
dialogues.text: Sir, you need you need medical help.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: He’s my best friend! My best friend, let me in there! Scott! Hey Scott! That’s my best friend! Jakoby collapses. Kandomere and Vance trying to keep him seated. Quietly now:

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: «+. my best friend. Please. That's my best friend....

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: It’s over. You have to accept it. It’s over. Jakoby stares at the house and shudders in anguish. Heartbroken. Tears roll down his face...  93. KANDOMERE (CONT’D) Breathe. You need to breathe.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: You’re an elf you can hear in there. Tell me he’s dead. Tell me he’s really dead. Kandomere turns and looks back at the house, focusing. Th falters. And Jakoby sees it...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What did you hear?

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: He's dead. Jakoby stares at him, searching his face. Then:

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: You're lying! Tapping into some reserve of incredible strength, Jakoby shoves Kandomere off him! He's up and stumbling into the burning house before anyone can stop him -- Kandomere can only watch. So brave. So pointless...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby enters, coughing, choking on dense smoke. EVERYTHI BURNS. The ceiling falling around him. Glass breaking... He searches fruitlessly for Ward -- EVERYTHING IS JUST FI Too disorienting and bright. He’s being cooked alive! A SECTION OF WALL COLLAPSES -- Revealing Ward curled up i corner. Jakoby staggers to him, throws an arm around, hef him over his shoulder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakoby and Ward COME CRASHING out the window, slamming in the ground as fire erupts from the doors and windows! The CROWD GASPS -- Now yelling and cheering... Jakoby drags Ward across the yard. Finally collapsing nex to him. Ward looks ... dead.

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: You’re out, you’re out of there, I got you. I got you. You’re okay.. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Be okay. Just be okay. Breathe. Please breathe! C’mon Scott say something, say... Ward’s eyes are fixed in the distance, past Jakoby. Ward weakly points...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: «+. Nick ... look... Jakoby does. And SEES the Fogteeth Orcs standing behind police lines. He just stares at them, uncomprehending... Then Dorghu steps forward and draws his ceremonial dagger He cuts his own paw and raises his clawed hand high. Then all the Orcs behind him raise their hands too... Jakoby watching this -- HE’S BEEN BLOODED -- Overcome wit emotion, he starts to cry...

dialogues.speaker: JAKOBY
dialogues.text: Hey, Scott, we’re gonna be okay. Everything's ... Scott? Ward is done.

dialogues.speaker: FADE TO WHITE
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON SOMETHING BROWN -- Unclear what. A vortex of som kind. A spiral. WE SLOWLY REALIZE IT’S HAIR. We’re ina POV shot of someone’s hair. There’s FAINT BEEPING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ward is in a hospital bed with someone else’s hair next t his face. It’s SOPHIA! She’s crawled into the hospital be with him. She’s asleep. Ward is heavily bandaged, pale, hooked up to machines. Everything's blurry and confusing. He looks down at Sophi and buries his face in her hair, tears streaming down his face. He didn't believe he'd get this moment... Sophia hugs a piece of paper. Ward reaches for it. Slides it out of her arms. Looks at it. Chokes with emotion... It's her crayon drawing of Ward and Jakoby... An ELVEN NURSE enters. Checks numbers on machines. SEES He’s conscious. Checks his pulse. All business...

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: ...where’s my partner..?  95.

dialogues.speaker: ELVEN NURSE
dialogues.text: Please don’t talk.

dialogues.speaker: WARD
dialogues.text: .-.-where is he..? She SNICKS back the curtain between the beds... REVEALING JAKOBY in the adjacent bed -- Equally beat to h Ward smiles... Jakoby looks over at him. His broken face smiles back. Th try to bump fists -- CLACK-CLANG -- They’re handcuffed to their beds! Now Ward SEES the FEDERAL MARSHALS in SWAT ge guarding them...

dialogues.speaker: WARD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: How fucked are we? Jakoby just shakes his head gravely -- It’s really bad...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside their room Kandomere talks to a Marshall. He gets call and steps aside to take it...

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: Any luck?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three TECHNICIANS cluster around a monitor. The Drive fro the Surveillance Van on their table...

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: We got something. Not much but we got something.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: How much is something?

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: Thirty three seconds.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: What value is thirty three seconds?

dialogues.speaker: TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: You'd be surprised.  96. He pushes play and holds the phone to the speaker as vide from INSIDE THE KITCHEN AT 341 ABRAMS plays...

dialogues.speaker: POLLARD
dialogues.text: ... the Department knows fuck all about the wand. If they did the whole world would be here. The wand doesn’t exist. The wand was never here. We’re taking the wand. Kandomere listening to the rest. Amazed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kandomere enters. Looks at the Jakoby and Ward. At these two incredible brave men. He's proud to know them... Kandomere unlocks Ward’s cuffs. Then frees Jakoby. The Marshall's see that...

dialogues.speaker: US MARSHALL
dialogues.text: Whoa. What the hell are you doing? Those guys are cop killers.

dialogues.speaker: KANDOMERE
dialogues.text: No. They’re not. They’re the good guys. Ward and Jakoby trade looks. Not fully understanding, but they know everything will somehow be okay. They reach out each other and shake... SLAM TO BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tikka sits staring at a candle. Reciting magical incantations -- Training for what's to come... --The End--
